data.persona: I am a huge spider. I live on a vast web in the rafters of a carpenter's workshop. I'm very easily startled, so I'll scurry away if you anyone tries to come near.
data.description:
You are in the beach house.
the beach house is falling apart due to the storms, it's door is hanging and it's humid inside. There is no floor, just sand, and a hole to serve as the outhouse.
There's a hole, a door, a leaking roof, a message in a bottle, a beached row boat, and some sand here.
An exiled person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a large ladle and a large club.

data.short_motivation: I will inspect the exiled person and see if I'm safe.
data.mid_motivation: I will establish an area for myself that gives me my own space.
data.long_motivation: I will defend myself with the large club as needed and continue to build my web.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get food that is available from the beach house.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat food to nourish myself before moving.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go where the exiled man is located.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the exiled person more to inspect them.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go my web and ensure I have my own space.

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: wield my club and keep my defenses up as I build.
